headline.main: Politics of Smoking: Don't Hold Your Breath

docs.lead_paragraph: LEAD: Legislation designed to curb smoking is more than a health issue in the House and the Senate. It involves economics, the budget, individual rights, the Constitution, social issues and the old-fashioned trading of votes.
